content: solid stitch lines sock recipe for not so plain and rather elegant toe-up socks it s a close sibling to my pattern slip_stitch lines worked in two colors pick two colours a variegated main colour which will fade into the background and a solid maybe semisolid contrast colour which will produce the foreground ideally the solid colour is one of the colours on the spectrum of the variegated colour you will need equal amounts of the two colours depending on the length of your socks with a bit more of the variegated mc needed this is not a whole sock pattern but rather a recipe to be supplemented with your favourite toe and heel i prefer using short-row toe and heel constructions a fabulous one can be bought on ravelry for us $ 1 00 from the sox therapist http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/gish-lips-kiss-heel notes and annotations this is a recipe for making socks which requires some knowledge on sock construction and your preferred sizing my sock measures 17cm some hints on sizing are given based on my gauge and sock circumference unstretched and size gits a 21 cm circumference foot the recipe gives hints and additional information that can be ignored if you use a different toe and / or heel construction or do not need a mini-gusset with the flk heel gauge on 10x10 cm 34 stitches and 56 row in stockinette after soaking size 64 stitches european 39 uk 6 us 8 5 narrow feet for a different size you can either adjust your needle size yarn or alter the stitch count by a about 300 m of fingering 150 m of each colour multiple of four shibui knits sock shown in the pics video tutorial for elongated needles stitches 2 25mm us 1 and 2mm us for ribbing https //www youtube com/wa tch v=jt5pszfbyje © la maison de saba 2018 solid stitch lines page 1 of 3 v 1 1 stitch pattern cc r 1 #k1 k1 with twisting the yarn around the needle twice k2# repeat between # mc r 2 #k1 slip 1 purlwise with yarn in back k2# repeat between # mc r 3 #k1 slip 1 purlwise with yarn in back k2# repeat between # mc r 4 #k1 slip 1 purlwise with yarn in back k2# repeat between # carry your yarn on the inside and take care to cross mc and cc when alternating yarns r row k knit instructions personally i like to use the fish with cc and size 2 25mm needle and using your preferred lips kiss heel method for the toe construction cast on and work to a toe box of app 5 cm toes as well with a provisional length and 64 stitches circumference cast on cast on 32 stitches work a flk toe on 1+11+8+11+1 divide your work into 32 instep stitches and 32 sole stitches stitches pick up 32 sole stitches the instep stitches are the beginning of your round from provisional cast on
